content: I'm looking for some recommendations on luggage. I've been using my old suitcase for a while, and it's showing its age. I'm interested in a hard-shell suitcase, but I'm not sure what features to look for. Can you help me out? By the way, I just got back from a trip to California today and had to buy a new phone charger at the airport because I forgot to pack mine - what a hassle!
